Prince Adewale Laoye, onye a maara dịka (Drummer of Peace) bụ onye Naijiria na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede uri, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye ọsụ ụzọ nke nka ọgbara ọhụrụ nke African Talking drum. Akwụkwọ akụkọ The Guardian kọwara ya dịka onye isi nke oge a nke African talking drum

Laoye bụ onye guzobere “Aafin Ilu’ (Obí nke Drum), uwe ọdịbendị e mere iji kwalite nka na ihe omume ọdịbendị, site na itinye ihe ọmụma nke Talking Drum, iji mee emume ọdịbendị Afrịka. Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị nna nna nke Oba Laoye,Timi nke Ede, onye na-agba egwu King.
